tred_extension.title: Hyderabad Dependency Treebank
tred_extension.copyright: Petr Pajas and Dan Zeman and Jan Štěpánek
tred_extension.description: This package contains a conversion script for the original .morph format of the Hyderabad Dependency Treebank (HyDT) to PML and for the CoNLL representation to PML with detransliteration of form and lemma and provides a stylesheets for visualization of the resulting PML in TrEd. Works both for ICON2009 and ICON2010 versions of the data.
